info.title: Schema of Azure Kubernetes Service events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure Kubernetes Service events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent

ContainerServiceNewKubernetesVersionAvai.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ContainerService.NewKubernetesVersionAvailable event

latestSupportedKubernetesVersion.description: The highest PATCH Kubernetes version for the highest MINOR version supported by ManagedCluster resource

latestStableKubernetesVersion.description: The highest PATCH Kubernetes version for the MINOR version considered stable for the ManagedCluster resource

lowestMinorKubernetesVersion.description: The highest PATCH Kubernetes version for the lowest applicable MINOR version available for the ManagedCluster resource

latestPreviewKubernetesVersion.description: The highest PATCH Kubernetes version considered preview for the ManagedCluster resource. There might not be any version in preview at the time of publishing the event

ContainerServiceClusterSupportEndedEvent.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ContainerService.ClusterSupportEnded event

ContainerServiceClusterSupportEndingEven.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ContainerService.ClusterSupportEnding event

ContainerServiceNodePoolRollingStartedEv.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ContainerService.NodePoolRollingStarted event

ContainerServiceNodePoolRollingSucceeded.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ContainerService.NodePoolRollingSucceeded event

ContainerServiceNodePoolRollingFailedEve.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ContainerService.NodePoolRollingFailed event

ContainerServiceClusterSupportEventData.description: Schema of common properties of cluster support events

kubernetesVersion.description: The Kubernetes version of the ManagedCluster resource

ContainerServiceNodePoolRollingEventData.description: Schema of common properties of node pool rolling events

nodePoolName.description: The name of the node pool in the ManagedCluster resource
